overview: Alma and Sam live together, yet each in her own universe. Sam is the more extroverted type, a woman of action; Alma is rather withdrawn and contemplative. Full of passion, they bridge the differences in their daily life. When it comes to love, they both agree: they long for the ultimate commitment. Their journey proves not to be easy, as their same-sex union is not approved by everyone. However, hope is awaiting them at the end of the path.
title: Left to Their Senses
